testcase.name: Demonstrate POST, GET, UPDATE, DELETE methods
testcase.system-out: Given url 'https://api.escuelajs.co/api/v1/products' ...................... passed * def randomProductId = Math.floor(Math.random() * 400) + 100 ............. passed * def title = 'New Karate Product - Debomita' + randomProductId ........... passed * print 'Generated title:', title ......................................... passed And request ............................................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 201 ........................................................... passed * def productId = response.id ............................................. passed * print 'Created product is', productId ................................... passed
